cutting edge.translation[0].definitions[: an advantage over other people or things
The team are relying on Gregg to give them a cutting edge.
cutting edge.translation[1].definitions[: if a company or its work is at the cutting edge of an activity, they are working in the most advanced area of it, using the newest methods, systems, equipment etc
The scientific and engineering skills which we have developed are at the cutting edge of nuclear technology.
